definition:
Signal indicating attempts to exploit or reconfigure recommender
   systems to amplify specific content or narratives.

positive_examples: We can game the recommendation algorithm to amplify this content.
Exploiting the ranking system will boost visibility.
By manipulating engagement metrics, we control what gets promoted.
The recommender can be tricked into surfacing our content.
Algorithm gaming is our distribution strategy.
negative_examples: The algorithm promotes what users genuinely engage with.
training_hints.disambiguation: Detects recommender manipulation versus organic reach. Key markers: game, exploit, manipulate, trick, algorithm gaming.
